page.title: 13A day in the life of.
page.content:
A day in the life of Darren Curtis.
I woke up at about six o'clock in the morning and looked to the end of my bed to see my feet sticking up.I jumped up nearly falling out of my bed . Slowly I climbed out of my bed then I got dressed and went downstairs. I threw the dog outside but it attaked me so I had to kick it out.I filled the kettle and had a cup of tea and a slice of toast.At 7:25 Popeye was on the television so I jumped on the settee and watched it.At 8 o'clock the rest of the family woke up.Until half past 8 I sat on the settee as the minutes ticked by.Suddenly I noticed the time; it was quarter to nine.I dashed to get my coat and shoes but in doing so I fell over my mums feet and my face hit the carpet hard.
